languageKey.label: powermail
Powerful and easy mailform extension with database storing, javascript validation and many more...
Warning!
You have to use the "Update"-Button below to ensure proper working for all functions in this extension.
Important!
Powermail comes with a new updater-script which fix pages with "none"-effects selected. You have to run this script if you are updating from older installation.
[Click here to open the updater]

Actions:
Update results:

The updater manipulates your database and due to the huge amount of configuration variants it is possible that it
might not produce the expected results.
So backup your database (at least the table tt_content) or do a t3d export of your site BEFORE
you click on any of the "DO IT" Buttons.
Search for empty powermail storage page settings in tt_content

Should the updater fix this settings?
(If you click "DO IT" all empty storage page settings inside powermail content elements will be set to the page containing itself)
